numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a linear pattern in this data.
2. This linear pattern means that the two age groups in each country share similar opinions about the future.
3. In Indonesia, both age groups are the most optimistic among the countries.
4. Brazil has one of the lowest percentages in both age groups.
5. Mali has one of the lowest percentages in both age groups.
6. I wonder which factors affected the views in these countries.
7. I wonder why the two age groups are coordinated in their views on this topic.
8. I wonder how people who are younger than 15 would respond to this study.
9. This data reminds me of a lesson in Psychology.
10. The lesson was about the happiest countries in the world.
11. Denmark was the happiest country in the lesson.
14. Looking on the Bright Side - Generational Optimism by Country
